Definition: C.24 - EHDS refined base model for Immunization

Short: Common header for all patient-related data
Definition: Common header for all patient-related data
Patient/subject information
Business identifier for the object
Resource authoring details
Author(s) by whom the resource was/were authored. Multiple authors could be provided.
Date and time of the issuing the document/resource by its author.

Short: Date and time of the last update to the resource
Definition: Date and time of the last update to the document/information
Status of the resource

Short: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Definition: Reason for the current status of the resource.
Language in which the resource is written. Language is expressed by the IETF language tag.
Business version of the resource.

Short: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document
Definition: A narrative easy-to-read representation of the full data set, e.g. PDF-version of a document
Indicates the current status of the immunization event (completed, not-done).
Disease or agent that the vaccination provides protection against.
Generic description of the vaccine/prophylaxis or its component(s).
Binding Description: SNOMED CT, ATC (IDMP/ EMA SPOR SMS)

Definition: Medicinal product administered.

Short: Number in a series of vaccinations / doses
Definition: Order in the vaccination course.
The date and time when the vaccination was administered
Name/code of administering centre or a health authority responsible for the vaccination event
Name or health professional code responsible for administering the vaccine or prophylaxis
The date when the vaccination is planned to be given/repeated (e.g. next dose)
